question: 2018 U.S. Open, what is the sport?

content.source_1: 2018 U.S. Open (badminton) The 2018 U.S. Open, officially YONEX U.S. Open 2018 was a badminton tournament which took place at Titan Gym in Fullerton, California, United States from 12 to 17 June 2018 and had a total prize of $150,000. The 2018 U.S. Open was the tenth tournament of the 2018 BWF World Tour and also part of the U.S. Open championships, which had been held since 1954. This tournament was organized by USA Badminton and sanctioned by the BWF. This international tournament was held at Titan Gym on the campus of California State University, Fullerton in Fullerton, California,
content.source_2: 2018 U.S. Open Cup The 2018 Lamar Hunt U.S. Open Cup was the 105th edition of the U.S. Open Cup, a knockout cup competition in American soccer. It is the oldest ongoing competition in the United States and was contested by 97 teams from leagues in the U.S. system. The 97 entrants included the 20 American clubs from Major League Soccer and 22 non-affiliated American clubs in the United Soccer League.
